title: Grimoire Diabolique
description: What do you get when you collect 92k words of the most vile, disgusting, gore-soaked, sick, twisted and demented fiction from the true master of hardcore horror, Edward Lee... The Grimoire Diaboligue. A massive eBook collection of the most brutal of Mr. Lee's short stories and novellas. All available in one place for the first time digitally.Mr. TorsoMiss TorsoThe DritiphilistGrub Girl In The Prison Of Dead WomenThe McCrath Model SS40-C Series SMakakThe BabyMotherThe Wrong GuyEver NatHandsTheSalt-Diviner
author: Edward Lee
